name: Vendor Templates for Dokan – Collection of templates for Dokan sellers
author: Al Rubyat

sections.description:
A Vendor templates collection plugin for Dokan marketplace plugin. This plugin gives vendors to lots of vendors templates design collection to change their vendor store looks.

VENDOR TEMPLATES PLUGIN FOR DOKAN

ðŸ‘‰ Official Free Demo Link: Official Demo

POWERED BY TechRubyat and Dokan

Vendor Templates For Dokan plugin gives vendors to lots of vendors templats design collections to change their vendor store looks.
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from the Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Q. Can I get new design of vendor templates?

A. Yes, you will get new vendor store templates.

Q. Does this plugin integrate with Other multi-vendor plugin?

A. Not for the moment. We have plans to integrate with other multi-vendor plugin via an add-on in the near future.

Q. Is Vendor templates Dokan responsive?

A. Yes, Vendor templates for Dokan plugin are fully responsive.
